mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( USER_IDX , USER_KEY , USER_NAME , USER_AGE , BIRTH , E_MAIL , PHONE_NUMBER , GENDER , REGISTRATION_DATE , COUNTING , OUTL_CTT , CHK01 , CHK02 , CHK03 , CHK04 , DEL_YN , LUPD_CNT , PC_TS ) VALUES ( NULL , #{USER_KEY} , #{USER_NAME} , #{USER_AGE} , DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(#{BIRTH}, now()), '%Y-%m-%d') , #{E_MAIL} , #{PHONE_NUMBER} , #{GENDER} , DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(#{REGISTRATION_DATE}, now()), '%Y-%m-%d') , IFNULL(#{COUNTING}, 1) , #{OUTL_CTT} , IFNULL(#{CHK01}, '0') , IFNULL(#{CHK02}, '0') , IFNULL(#{CHK03}, '0') , IFNULL(#{CHK04}, '0') , 'N' , 1 , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT T1.USER_KEY , T1.USER_IDX , T1.USER_NAME , T1.USER_AGE , DATE_FORMAT(T1.BIRTH, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BIRTH , T1.E_MAIL , T1.PHONE_NUMBER , (CASE T1.GENDER WHEN 'M' THEN '남성' WHEN 'W' THEN '여성' END) AS GENDER , DATE_FORMAT(T1.REGISTRATION_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REGISTRATION_DATE , T1.COUNTING , DATE_FORMAT(T1.PC_TS, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS PC_TS , T1.DEL_YN FROM TB_MEMBER T1 WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT T1.USER_KEY , T1.USER_NAME , T1.USER_AGE , DATE_FORMAT(T1.BIRTH, '%Y-%m-%d') AS BIRTH , T1.E_MAIL , T1.PHONE_NUMBER , (CASE T1.GENDER WHEN 'M' THEN '남성' WHEN 'W' THEN '여성' END) AS GENDER , DATE_FORMAT(PC_TS, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS PC_TS , DATE_FORMAT(T1.REGISTRATION_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REGISTRATION_DATE , T1.COUNTING , T1.CHK01 , T1.CHK02 , T1.CHK03 , T1.CHK04 , T1.OUTL_CTT , T1.DEL_YN FROM TB_MEMBER T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.USER_KEY = #{USER_KEY}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET LUPD_CNT = IFNULL(LUPD_CNT, 0) + 1 , DEL_YN = 'Y' , PC_TS = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_KEY = #{USER_KEY} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.LEV , A.IDX , A.USER_KEY , A.TITLE , A.NAME , A.CONTENTS , A.HIT_CNT , A.CHK_INFO , A.DEL_YN , A.PC_DT FROM ( SELECT '1' AS LEV , T1.IDX , T1.USER_KEY , T1.TITLE , T1.NAME , T1.CONTENTS , T1.HIT_CNT , T1.CHK_INFO , T1.DEL_YN , DATE_FORMAT(T1.PC_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PC_DT FROM TB_BOARD_NOTICE T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.CHK_INFO = '1' AND T1.DEL_YN = 'N'
UNION
SELECT '2' AS LEV , T1.IDX , T1.USER_KEY , T1.TITLE , T1.NAME , T1.CONTENTS , T1.HIT_CNT , T1.CHK_INFO , T1.DEL_YN , DATE_FORMAT(T1.PC_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS PC_DT FROM TB_BOARD_NOTICE T1 WHERE 1 = 1 ) A WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY A.LEV ASC , A.IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD_NOTICE ( IDX , USER_KEY , TITLE , NAME , CONTENTS , HIT_CNT , CHK_INFO , LUPD_CNT , DEL_YN , PC_DT , PC_TS ) VALUES ( NULL , NULL , #{USER_KEY} , #{TITLE} , #{NAME} , #{CONTENTS} , 1 , IFNULL(#{CHK_INFO}, '0') , 1 , 'N' , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD_NOTICE SET HIT_CNT = IFNULL(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND IDX = #{IDX}
